howCanIHelp: Ta yaya zan iya taimaka maka yau?
alanMistakes: Alan na iya yin kuskure. Yi amfani da ƙwarewar likitanci. 7/25
name: Suna
passwordTitle: Shigar da kalmar sirri ta Alan
passwordErrorMsg: Kalmar sirri ba daidai ba. Gwada sake
noCodeLine: Babu ko ba daidai ba? Tuntuɓe mu nan
eyeMarqueeLine2: Ta yaya zan ga optic disc da Arclight?
eyeMarqueeLine3: Namiji 25, ido ja har kwana 3, tsoron haske, gani ya ragu kaɗan
eyeMarqueeLine5: A turawa cataract da aka haifa da ita gaggawa?
eyeMarqueeLine6: Mace 65, gani ya yi rauni, ba ta sanya gilashi. Gaban ido lafiya, lens ta yi duhu
eyeMarqueeLine7: Uwa na damuwa: jariri yana da farar pupil, ba ya gani da wannan idon
earMarqueeLine2: Zan iya ganin tympanic membrane da Arclight?
earMarqueeLine3: Matashi 16, radadin pinna kwana 2, kaikayi, ji har yanzu lafiya
earMarqueeLine4: Faɗa mini game da wanke kunne (syringing)
earMarqueeLine5: A tura mastoiditis nan da nan?
earMarqueeLine6: Namiji 73, sauraro ya ragu. Canal ba a gani sosai, cerumen kawai
earMarqueeLine7: Jariri ba ya mayar da martani ga sauti. Watanni da dama kenan
geoInfoText: Latsa "Gano wuri" domin a tura madaidaicin wuri (lat/long). Wannan na taimaka wajen ba da shawarwari mafi kyau.
frontOfEyeText:
Duba ka kwatanta idanu: tsaye, dama, hagu, sama, ƙasa
Kusanto ka riƙe ido. Dubi: gafaka (fatar ido), conjunctiva, cornea, pupil
Yi amfani da fluoro domin raunukan cornea ko kaikayi
fundalReflexText:
Daki mai duhu, jariri kwance; a nisan hannu—kwatanta reflex
Daidai: haske, launi, siffa
Kusanto don daki-daki: tabo, cataract, RB, Vit Haem
backOfEyeText:
Yi amfani da idanunka na dama don ido na dama na maras-lafiya; hagun ka don hagun
Majinyaci ya kalli gaba, KAR ya kalli haske; kusanto ka nemo optic disc (dilate = mafi kyawun gani)
Duba disc: gefe, launi, kwano. Bi manyan jijiyoyi, sa'an nan ka bukaci ya kalli haske don ganin macula
additionalText_eye:
San discs: al'ada, ta kumbura, sabbin jijiyoyi, mai zurfin kwano, ta pho
>Yi atisaye akai-akai<
allAroundEarText:
Duba: pinna, tragus, mastoid don kumburi, radadi ko zubar ruwa
Motsar da pinna a hankali, ka lura da radadi
earCanalText:
Dinga kaɗa kai, riƙe Arclight kamar alƙalami
Ja pinna sama/ baya (ga manya) ko ƙasa/ baya (ga yara)
Saka speculum (4.5 mm manya, 2.5 mm yara), tura gashi gefe, juya idan ya cancanta
Duba: wax, datti, infection
tympanicMembraneText:
Gane handle na malleus, reflex ɗin haske, da attic
Lura da: launi, matsayi, bayyananniya
Duba ko akwai huda, ruwa ko tabo
additionalText_ear:
San TM: al'ada, ja, ta kumbura, ta ja baya, ta huda
>Yi atisaye akai-akai<
generalObservationText:
Duba kumburi, canjin launi da yaduwa
Latsa a hankali don laushi, zafi ko radadi
uvLightText:
A daki duhu ka duba fluorescence:
tinea (shuɗi-kore), pityriasis versicolor (tagulla-oranj), erythrasma (jan koral), vitiligo (shuɗi-fari), acne (jan oranj), nits (shuɗi mai laushi)
dermoscopyText:
Riƙe polariser na Arclight kamar alƙalami, ka duba: ABCDE (Asymmetry, Border, Colour, Diameter >6 mm, Evolution)
Kalli: PDSBV (pigment network, dots, streaks, blue-white, vascular)
additionalText_skin:
San lahani: al'ada, mai zargi, mai kumburi
>Yi atisaye akai-akai<
aboutAlanText:
Alan na’ura ce ta AI da ke taimakawa wajen binciken ido, kunne da fata: samfurin harshen asali da ka’idojin alama. Mai basira. Mai dogaro. Na zamani.

Ilimin asibiti, na yankin da hotuna an daidaita su ga ma’aikatan lafiya da likitoci. Tattaunawa takaice tana ba da ganowa da shirin kula. Arclight tana cikin kowane mataki.
instructionsIntro: Alan yana taimaka wa ɗalibai da masu samun matsalolin ido, kunne ko fata lokaci-lokaci. Rubuta ko yi magana a sarari, ka guji bayanan da za su fallasa mutum. Duba kai/fuska/ɓangaren jiki da kyau, ka binciki idanu da kunnuwa duka biyun. Sa’a!
instructionsPatientPrompt: Faɗa wa Alan game da maras lafiya:
instructionsUseArclight_default: Yi amfani da Arclight: gaba, fundal reflex, bayan ido.
instructionsUseArclight_eye: Yi amfani da Arclight: gaba, fundal reflex, bayan ido.
instructionsTooLittle_eye: Namiji, ido ja — me ke faruwa?
instructionsJustRight_eye: Namiji 25, ido ja kwana 3. Babu magani ko matsalar ido a baya. Ciwo, hawaye, farin tabo a cornea. Pupilin lafiya, gani 6/12; ɗayan ido 6/6.
instructionsTooMuch_eye: Namiji ya shigo yau da ido ja, yana zargin abincin da ya ci. Na ga hawaye da gefen ido ja. Yana buƙatar taimako; yana damuwa da cornea da ciwo. Yace, 'Mece ce wannan?'
instructionsAdditionalQuery_eye: Alan na amsa tambayoyin karatu: Menene iritis? Ta yaya zan ga retina?
instructionsUseArclight_ear: Yi amfani da Arclight: kunnuwa sosai, canal, drum.
instructionsTooLittle_ear: Namiji, kunne ja — me ke faruwa?
instructionsJustRight_ear: Namiji 25, kunne ja kwana 3. Babu magani ko matsalar kunne a baya. Ciwo, ruwa daga kunne. Drum ja, sauraro ya ragu a kunnwar da ke ciwo, lafiya a ɗayan.
instructionsTooMuch_ear: Namiji ya zo da kunne ja, yana zargin abinci. Na ga ruwa da gefen ja. Yana neman taimako; yana damuwa da sauraro da ciwo. Yace, 'Mece ce wannan?'
instructionsAdditionalQuery_ear: Alan na amsa tambayoyin karatu: Menene otitis media? Ta yaya zan tsabtace kunne?
instructionsTooLittle_skin: Namiji, fata ja — me ke faruwa?
instructionsJustRight_skin: Namiji 25, tabo ja a fata kwana 3. Babu magani ko matsalar fata a baya. Fata na ciwo, na kaikayi.
instructionsTooMuch_skin: Namiji ya zo da fata ja, yana zargin abinci. Na ga ruwa da gefen ja. Yana neman taimako; yana damuwa da pigment da kumburi. Yace, 'Mece ce wannan?'
instructionsAdditionalQuery_skin: Alan na amsa tambayoyin karatu: Menene eczema? Ta yaya zan ga tsarin pigment?
instructionText: Alan yana taimaka wa ɗalibai da waɗanda lokaci-lokaci ke fuskantar matsalolin ido, kunne ko fata. Rubuta ko yi magana a sarari, ka guji bayanan da za su fallasa mutum.
comingSoon: Zuwa nan ba da jimawa ba...
